type.description:
The field type. It determines the UI component to be used to render it. Allowed types are:
- `boolean` (rendered as a CheckBox)
- `numeric` (rendered as a Counter)
- `text` (rendered as a Input)
- `radio` (rendered as a RadioButton)
- `checkbox` (rendered as a CheckBox)
- `toggle` (rendered as a Toggle)
- `rater` (rendered as a Rater)
- `slider` (rendered as a Slider)
- `input` (rendered as a Input)
- `counter` (rendered as a Counter)
- `password` (rendered as a Password)

required.description: If true, the field switch to error state if its value is empty

validate.description: Custom validation function called on submit

headerClassName.description: Custom classname applied on every header element

headerProps.description: Custom props applied on every header element (including MoBrix-ui shared props)

errorLabel.description: Custom error box content, displayed when FormField is in error state
